briefdescription.para: This function performs 1x1 kernels convolution for signed 8-bit integer inputs/outputs in any x and y dimensions with bias inputs and symmetric quantization on the outputs..

parameterdescription.para: pointer of the input tensor
x dimension of the input tensor
y dimension of the input tensor
number of input tensor channels
pointer of kernel weights
number of output tensor channels
x dimension of the filter kernel
y dimension of the filter kernel
padding size in the x dimension
padding size in the y dimension
convolution stride in the x dimension
convolution stride in the y dimension
pointer of the bias vector
right shift amount for the output
value of scaling for the output
right shift amount for the output
pointer of the output tensor
x dimension of the output tensor
y dimension of the output tensor
temporary buffer for the input tensor. It is required when -mext-dsp or -mext-vector is enabled and its size must be equal to "2 * in_tensor_ch * ker_dim_x * ker_dim_y".

simplesect.para: This function returns 0 on success; otherwise, it returns -1 if its inputs do not meet the constraints (see the Note below for details).

listitem.para:
The input constraints of this function are:
in_tensor_ch is a multiple of 4
out_tensor_ch is a multiple of 2
ker_dim_x is 1
ker_dim_y is 1
pad_x is 0
pad_y is 0
stride_x is 1
stride_y is 1
The outputs will be 2-stage shifted before being stored, i.e., out = ((out >> pre_rshift) *out_scale) >> post_rshift.

briefdescription.para: This function performs fast convolution for signed 8-bit integer inputs/outputs in any x and y dimensions with symmetric quantization on the outputs.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of the input vector
x dimension of the input tensor
y dimension of the input tensor
number of input tensor channels
pointer of kernel weights
number of output tensor channels
x dimension of the filter kernel
y dimension of the filter kernel
padding size in the x dimension
padding size in the y dimension
convolution stride in the x dimension
convolution stride in the y dimension
right shift amount for the output
value of scaling for the output
right shift amount for the output
pointer of the output tensor
x dimension of the output tensor
y dimension of the output tensor
temporary buffer for the input tensor. It is required when -mext-dsp or -mext-vector enabled and its size must be equal to "2 * in_tensor_ch * ker_dim_x * ker_dim_y".

simplesect.para: This function returns 0 on success; otherwise, it returns -1 if its inputs do not meet the constraints that in_tensor_ch is a multiple of 4 and out_tensor_ch is a multiple of 2.
The outputs will be 2-stage shifted before being stored, i.e., out = ((out >> pre_rshift) *out_scale) >> post_rshift.

memberdef.argsstring: (const q7_t *in_tensor, const uint16_t in_tensor_dim_x, const uint16_t in_tensor_dim_y, const uint16_t in_tensor_ch, const q7_t *ker_weight, const uint16_t out_tensor_ch, const uint16_t ker_dim_x, const uint16_t ker_dim_y, const uint16_t pad_x, const uint16_t pad_y, const uint16_t stride_x, const uint16_t stride_y, const uint16_t pre_rshift, const uint16_t out_scale, const uint16_t post_rshift, q15_t *out_tensor, const uint16_t out_tensor_dim_x, const uint16_t out_tensor_dim_y, q15_t *in_tmp_buf)

memberdef.name: hpm_nn_conv_dw_HWC_s8_s8_s8_sym_bias

briefdescription.para: This function performs depthwise convolution for signed 8-bit integer inputs/outputs with bias inputs and symmetric quantization on the outputs.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of the input tensor
dimension of the input tensor
number of input tensor channels
pointer of kernel weights
number of output tensor channels
dimension of the filter kernel
padding size
convolution stride
pointer of the bias vector
right shift amount for the output
value of scaling for the output
right shift amount for the output
pointer of the output tensor
dimension of the output tensor
temporary buffer for the input tensor. It is required when -mext-dsp or -mext-vector is enabled and its size must be equal to "(in_tensor_ch * ker_dim * ker_dim + 1) / 2".

simplesect.para: This function returns 0 on success; otherwise, it returns -1 if its inputs do not meet the constraints that in_tensor_ch has to be equal to out_tensor_ch.
The outputs will be 2-stage shifted before being stored, i.e., out = ((out >> pre_rshift) *out_scale) >> post_rshift.

briefdescription.para: This function performs depthwise convolution for signed 8-bit integer inputs and signed 16-bit integer outputs in any x and y dimensions with bias inputs and symmetric quantization on the outputs.

parameterdescription.para: pointer of the input tensor
x dimension of the input tensor
y dimension of the input tensor
number of input tensor channels
pointer of kernel weights
number of output tensor channels
x dimension of the filter kernel
y dimension of the filter kernel
padding size in the x dimension
padding size in the y dimension
convolution stride in the x dimension
convolution stride in the y dimension
pointer of the bias vector
right shift amount for the output
value of scaling for the output
right shift amount for the output
pointer of the output tensor
x dimension of the output tensor
y dimension of the output tensor
temporary buffer for the input tensor. It is required when -mext-dsp or -mext-vector is enabled and its size must be equal to "(in_tensor_ch * ker_dim_x * ker_dim_y + 1) / 2".

simplesect.para: This function returns 0 on success; otherwise, it returns -1 if its inputs do not meet the constraints that in_tensor_ch must be equal to out_tensor_ch.
The outputs will be 2-stage shifted before being stored, i.e., out = ((out >> pre_rshift) *out_scale) >> post_rshift.

pad_y is 0
stride_x is 1
stride_y is 1
